name: Campaign Rhythm - Normal Mode
description: Validates narrative rhythm across 6-scene sequence (2 full approach/engage/aftermath cycles). Tests whether the engine naturally creates escalation, release, recovery, and renewed tension across multiple scenes without explicit campaign-level rules. Uses Normal rarity mode with fixed seed for reproducibility.

observe: Average severity per scene (look for rise/fall patterns)

expectations.mid_scenes: Pressured but recoverable (higher severity, moderate cutoffs)
expectations.later_scenes: Should feel affected by earlier scenes, not reset
expectations.overall: Clear rhythm of escalation and release, not flatline or runaway
